articles.title: At least 138 civilians killed in deadliest Burkina Faso attacks in years - News24
articles.description: Suspected jihadists have massacred at least 138 civilians in Burkina Faso's volatile north in the deadliest attacks since Islamist violence erupted in the west African country in 2015, officials said Saturday.
articles.content:
• Suspected jihadists have massacred at least 138 civilians in Burkina Faso.
  • The government stated that "terrorists," a term for jihadists, killed civilians of all ages and set fire to … [+3881 chars]
